title: Howard Hughes: The Untold Story
description: One of the most intriguing and controversial figures of the 20th century, billionaire Howard Hughes's bizarre life, torrid celebrity affairs, and shocking death have become the stuff of legend. Now this all-new, definitive biography, based on unsealed court documents, secret FBI reports, and countless new interviews, explores the mystique and truth behind Howard Hughes -- a man who continues to grip the world's imagination.
author: Peter Harry Brown
